content:
TITLE: Add Crossmint Client SDK to project
DESCRIPTION: This command adds the @crossmint/client-sdk-react-ui package to your project using yarn. This package is required for integrating Crossmint's services into React or Next.js applications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/packages/ui/react-ui/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
yarn add @crossmint/client-sdk-react-ui
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Crossmint Client SDK
DESCRIPTION: This command adds the Crossmint Client SDK Vanilla UI package to your project using yarn. It is a necessary first step to integrate Crossmint functionality into a vanilla JavaScript application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/packages/ui/vanilla-ui/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
yarn add @crossmint/client-sdk-vanilla-ui
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the App - yarn start
DESCRIPTION: This script starts the React application in development mode. It uses yarn to execute the start script, which typically launches a development server. The application will be accessible at http://localhost:3000, and the browser will automatically reload upon code changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/packages/starter/react-ui-starter/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Crossmint React UI Starter Locally
DESCRIPTION: This set of shell commands navigates to the React UI starter project and starts the application locally using yarn. This allows developers to test and preview the SDK's React UI components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
cd packages/starter/react-ui-starter
yarn start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building for Production - yarn build
DESCRIPTION: This script builds the React application for production and outputs the optimized build to the `build` folder. It uses yarn to execute the build script, which bundles the React code, minifies the files, and includes hashes in the filenames. The output is ready for deployment to a production environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/packages/starter/react-ui-starter/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Crossmint Client SDK Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: This shell command navigates to the SDK directory and installs all necessary dependencies using yarn. This step is required to build and run the SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
cd crossmint-client-sdk
yarn install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests - yarn test
DESCRIPTION: This script launches the test runner in interactive watch mode. It utilizes yarn to execute the test script, which sets up the testing environment and runs the defined tests. The test runner automatically watches for file changes and re-runs the tests accordingly.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/packages/starter/react-ui-starter/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Crossmint Client SDK Repository
DESCRIPTION: This shell command clones the Crossmint Client SDK repository from GitHub. It downloads the entire project to your local machine, enabling you to build, modify, and contribute to the SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/CrossMint/crossmint-client-sdk.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rebuilding Crossmint React UI Package
DESCRIPTION: This shell command rebuilds the `@crossmint/client-sdk-react-ui` package after making changes. It ensures that the latest modifications are compiled and ready for use.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
# Inside `packages/ui/react-ui`. Rebuild package
yarn build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Rebuilt Crossmint Package
DESCRIPTION: This shell command installs the rebuilt `@crossmint/client-sdk-react-ui` package within a starter project (e.g., Next.js starter). This step integrates the updated package into the consuming application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
# Inside the starter. Eg. `packages/starter/nextjs-starter`. Install rebuilt package
yarn
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Crossmint Client SDK Packages
DESCRIPTION: This shell command builds all the packages within the Crossmint Client SDK. This step compiles the source code into distributable modules, preparing the SDK for use in other projects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
yarn build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing Crossmint SDK (Internal)
DESCRIPTION: These shell commands outline the process for publishing the Crossmint SDK, including building, testing, versioning, and publishing the package. This sequence is intended for internal Crossmint team use.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
yarn build
yarn test
yarn run lerna version
yarn build
yarn run publish
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Ejecting Configuration - yarn eject
DESCRIPTION: This script ejects the Create React App configuration, providing full control over the build process. It is a one-way operation. It copies all configuration files and transitive dependencies into the project, allowing for complete customization but removing the Create React App dependency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/michaellyons/crossmint-client-sdk/blob/main/packages/starter/react-ui-starter/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn eject
```
